title: [MEDIUM] Unified Portfolio Dashboard - All Assets One View
body:
## Vision Gap

K.I.T. should show ALL assets across ALL platforms in ONE unified view.

## Current State
- Portfolio tracker exists but limited
- No cross-platform aggregation
- No unified P&L calculation

## Required Features

### Asset Sources
- CEX balances (Binance, Coinbase, etc.)
- DEX positions (Uniswap LP, etc.)
- DeFi positions (Aave, Lido, etc.)
- MT5 forex positions
- Stock broker holdings
- Wallet addresses (ETH, BTC)

### Unified View
- Total net worth
- Asset allocation pie chart
- Daily/Weekly/Monthly P&L
- Performance by asset class
- Exposure breakdown

### Commands
```
portfolio          - Full portfolio view
portfolio crypto   - Crypto only
portfolio defi     - DeFi positions
portfolio forex    - MT5 positions
portfolio pnl      - P&L breakdown
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Shows all assets from all sources
- [ ] Accurate total net worth
- [ ] P&L calculation works
- [ ] Updates in real-time

## Priority: MEDIUM
